question: I looking for information about what prenatal vitamins to take as a Type 1 Diabetic. I'm not trying to get pregnant at this moment but we did have a 'scare' last month so I figured I would start taking prenatal vitamins just to be safe.What should i be taking? Did you get a prescription for them or buy them over the counter?Thanks so much!
title: Prenatal Vitamins and Type 1 Diabetes
